[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#1C50A4″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”14px” link_font=”||||||||” link_text_color=”#ffffff” link_font_size=”14px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”5px||10px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”5px||10px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||2px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”13px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.5em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 Home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”0.5px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” header_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_font_size_phone=”22px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Wage Garnishment Relief

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”What is Wage Garnishment?” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font_size=”24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you owe money to the IRS, they can legally take collection actions against you. This includes, but is not limited to, garnishing your wages.

When the IRS moves to garnish a person’s wages, the agency contacts the taxpayer and the taxpayer’s employer, notifying both that garnishments will begin in 30 days. If the taxpayer hasn’t paid off their back taxes in full or taken steps to set up a payment plan with the IRS by the end of the 30-day period, the IRS will order the employer to begin sending a portion of the employee’s paycheck directly to the IRS.

Unlike private creditors, the IRS doesn’t have to take you to court and win a court-ordered judgment to legally garnish your wages. And the IRS is afforded wide discretion in determining the amount of money they want garnished. Generally speaking, the IRS can garnish 25% – 50% of a taxpayer’s earnings, depending on the circumstances.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”5px||5px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22color%22%93}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_heading title=”Can You Stop a Garnishment Once It Starts?” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Wage garnishments are essentially the IRS’s way to put the taxpayer into an installment plan (albeit, an involuntary one). Once the IRS begins garnishing a person’s wages, there are two primary ways to put a stop to future garnishments going forward.

• The taxpayer (or the taxpayer’s legal representative) works with the IRS to negotiate an alternative payment plan, such as an offer in compromise, a formal installment agreement, etc.
• The taxpayer pays their back taxes in full to IRS. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”5px||5px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22color%22,%22color%22%93}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_heading title=”Help Stopping Wage Garnishment with Optima Tax Relief” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As one can imagine, wage garnishment can create severe financial hardship. Working with qualified tax professionals, such as the team at Optima Tax Relief, can help you successfully resolve wage garnishments, bank seizures, property liens, and other IRS collection actions. Our tax attorneys and licensed tax professionals work tirelessly on behalf of taxpayers, fighting to protect their rights and their assets. Call us today and receive a free consultation today with one of our associates.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]
Trustpilot
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”center” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px|20px||20px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”10px|40px|10px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
